And try to have a close relationship and will say that he is sending a gift. They are specially mostly foreigners. They post nice handsome looking photos with english names. And they take your phone number and say the gift has received need to clear the parcel and ask money. Then they call you continuously. and will send the bank account to deposit the money asap then they say parcel will reach you immediately from Katunayake, But they are not foreigners they are Sri Lankans specially Muslims.
